title: Convo with Jon  - Patterns, Paradigms and Pirsig
description: Jon is a member of our Saturday ZaMM meetup. Besides Pirsig, we share common interests in the work in "this corner",  namely Peterson, Pageau and Vervaeke . Jon sees a pattern towards "the better" in numerous philosophies, spiritual practices. This pattern informs his own journey which he kindly shares here, along with insights, original ideas and a real knack for synthesizing all of the above and more from his unique body of study, reading and experiences.
